data.title: 2024 Event Calendar — Arbor Crest Wine Cellars
data.meta_description: Upcoming Events & Performances at Arbor Crest Wine Cellars
data.text:
100 Year Anniversary | Great Gatsby Gala

Summer Groove Party Band | 100 Year Anniversary Gala

Join us for this once in a lifetime celebration as our historic Cliff House Estate turns 100 years old! We will party with the incomparable Summer Groove Party Band and drink award winning Arbor Crest wines overlooking Spokane. Come dressed for The Great Gatsby theme or come as you are, but come ready to dance!!!!!!

View Event →

Diego Romero Band | Summer Concert Series

Diego Romero Band | Blues and Contemporary

Winner of the Best New Blues Band in 2019 from the IEBS, comes an electrifying new band staring

Diego Romero. Diego and his band are bound to keep you at the edge of your seat throughout the night with his explosive guitar work and booming vocals!

View Event →

Pamela Benton Band | Summer Concert Series

Pamela Benton Band | Jazz / Contemporary

Pamela Benton has assembled an all-star band featuring some of the finest musicians in the Northwest. Classically trained on the violin, she performs her originals, familiar favorites and covers with the full band sound.

View Event →

Soul Proprietor | Summer Concert Series

Soul Proprietor | Urban, Soul, Funk, Blues, Motown, R&B and Classic Rock

Soul Proprietor is a high-energy 10-piece "Urban Soul" band playing the best of Funk, Blues, Motown, R&B and Classic Rock – great music that makes you want to get up and dance! Featuring outstanding vocalists Rob Vaughn and Patrice Thompson-Rose, this horn-laden funk machine plays it all - from Bruno Mars to Aretha Franklin and Stevie Wonder; Earth Wind & Fire to Chicago and Tower of Power! Time to Funkifize!

View Event →

The Ronaldos | Summer Concert Series

The Ronaldos | Classic Rock

One of the best local rock groups in Spokane since 2016!

View Event →

Art and Glass Festival | 2024

Art and Glass Festival | 2024

The historic Cliff House Estate and Arbor Crest Wine Cellars hosts over 60 artists and vendors, including Art, Glass, Metal, Wood, Photography, Authors, Jewelers and more. Enjoy a glass of Arbor Crest wine and enjoy the enchanting views on the Estate! Ages 21 and Over Only. (Estate closes at 5:30pm)

View Event →

Alexa Wildish and Lennon VanderDoes | Summer Concert Series

Alexa Wildish and Lennon VanderDoes | Folk / Americana

Alexa's original music is defined by refined vocal, tinged with the roots of Americana. Every time Lennon performs, he mesmerizes audiences with his lively fingerstyle playing and uncanny vocal range. Alexa and Lennon met while on Season 24 of the Voice and they immediately loved the beauty and ease of each other's voices, and couldn't wait to sing & write more together. They are excited to continue to share what they've created with wider audiences.

View Event →

Son of Brad | Summer Concert Series

Son of Brad | Rock / Jazz

“I am a singer/songwriter/rock-Jazz fusion, fingerstyle guitarist, and a full time professional musician. I record live loops to create a fuller range of sound which underscores my singing and guitar work. I explore scales, chords, harmony and rhythm in new ways every night, composing new arrangements live, much like a traditional jazz musician.. ..much like my father Brad Mills. I have performed professionally for over 20 years and shared stages with many other well-known performers”

View Event →

Atomic Jive Band | Summer Concert Series

Atomic Jive Band | Blues / Jazz / R&B

Atomic Jive combines the foot-stomping energy of boogie bluesthe effortless cool of vintage R&B and the sunshine of clasic soul into an undeniable concert experience. Featuring a three piece horn section and a warm wall of sound, we guarantee a foot-stompin’, hand-clappin’ and hip-swayin’ good time.

View Event →

Kyle Richards | Summer Concert Series

Kyle Richards | Soft Rock / Country

Kyle Richard is a singer, songwriter, musician, and producer in Spokane, WA. Kyle is a one man band who uses multiple instruments and the use of a loop pedal to record himself live, plays it back on a loop while adding many layers, and creates a sound you might normally hear from a full band!

View Event →

Annual Car Show | 2024

Cars! Wine! Cars! This event is free to the public / Ages 21 and over only

All cars must register to be on the Estate grounds

View Event →

David Raitt and the Baja Boogie Band | Summer Concert Series

David Raitt and the Baja Boogie Band | Rockin’ Blues

Rockin’ Blues

View Event →

Michael Vallee | Summer Concert Series

Michael Vallee | Country / Rock

Meet Michael Vallee! He's a talented singer-songwriter and music producer who loves to play acoustic guitar and bring you some of your favorite music. With his loop station and real-time harmonizer, he creates a unique and unforgettable performance that you're sure to enjoy.

View Event →

Lake City Blues | Summer Concert Series

Lake City Blues | Rhythm / Blues

A group of veteran players with decades of touring and stage experience has become a PNW festival favorite performing a heart pounding showcase rhythm and blues review.

View Event →

Dallas Kay | Summer Concert Series

Dallas Kay | Original / Country / Alternative / Classics

Based in the Spokane/Coeur d' Alene area, established singer-songwriter Dallas Kay upholds the legacy of the Northwest music scene. Dallas has been singing since she was a little girl and performing regionally over the last 6 years including tours in Oregon and Western Washington. Dallas is a multiple-time IN-CMA nominee for Top Female Vocalist, Top Solo Artist, Entertainer of the Year and has won trophies for "Favorite New Act" in 2022, "Top Performer" in 2020, and "Top Newcomer" in 2019. She also received an Honorable Mention for Top Original Song.

View Event →

The Moops | Summer Concert Series

The Moops | Rock

Fun five piece Rock N Roll band covering music spanning four decades capturing the sound as close to the original songs as possible. You will want to get out of your seat and hit the dance floor.

View Event →

Sydney Dale Band | Summer Concert Series

Sydney Dale Band | Pop / Folk / R&B

Sydney’s musical prowess extends beyond her vocals. She masterfully plays the guitar, ukulele, and piano, using these instruments to infuse her songs with an authenticity that is both raw and real. Her music effortlessly blends pop with hints of jazz, R&B, and folk, creating a unique and enchanting mix that leaves audiences wanting more.

View Event →

Common Ground | Summer Concert Series

Common Ground | Rock

Common Ground is a Rock band that strives to lift up the soul of all who are listening! They play music that will make you wanna get up and dance and celebrate the day right along with them. They advocate quality time with family and children and strive to teach the younger generation the value in music, the outdoors, and good old fashioned comradery.

View Event →

Carli Osika | Summer Concert Series

Carli Osika | Pop / Country

Carli Osika is a pop-country singer songwriter from Coeur d’Alene, Idaho. She first took the stage with her guitar at an early age and quickly began to amass a local fan base. As an adult Carli spent three years honing her songwriting skills in Nashville, TN, before returning to the northwest.

Carli’s lively performances of multi-genre covers as well as crowd favorite originals like “Whiskey and Him” and “Emotion Sickness” recently earned her the title of Favorite Solo Artist at the 2022 Northwest Country Music Awards. Carli was also featured in 93.7 The Mountain’s first ever Local Artist Spotlight and in a 2023 STCU commercial. To stream Carli’s music and keep up to date with shows and new releases, follow her on all platforms @carliosika

View Event →

Soulful Brothers | Summer Concert Series

Soulful Brothers | Funk / Soul

Soulful Brothers is a powerhouse funk soul party trio featuring Max Daniels.

View Event →

Current Flow | Summer Concert Series

Current Flow | Rock / Reggae / Folk

Isaac's sounds are deeply rooted in acoustic expression, with rich soul filled tones, and lyrically driven vocals from the heart. His inspiration for creating music is to share a blended mix of the ups and downs in life, and that beauty can be found in our surroundings and in people if we simply look for it and recognize it! Positive energy is behind every note.

View Event →

Nu Jack City | Summer Concert Series

Nu Jack City | Motown Party

Nu Jack City is a high energy Americana party band that performs the greatest hits of Motown, Soul, R&B and country!

View Event →

RCA | Summer Concert Series

RCA / Riley Anderson | Pop / Soul

RCA is a PNW musician from Sandpoint, Idaho.

He plays a wide range of pop and soul originals as well as covers. By utilizing live looping he creates a one man band type of feel, while his songs convey inspiration and hope. He has played all over Washington, Oregon, Idaho, and Montana. He records his own music and has been featured on all platforms since 2023.

View Event →

Movement Music and Wine | Wine and Yoga

Danny McCullum and Chris Kohut will curate music to accompany actual yoga moves guided by Pilates Evolve Studios

Sunset Class 5:30-6:30pm

(check in at 5pm)

Afterwards enjoy a glass of Arbor Crest wine and enjoy the enchanting views on the Estate!

View Event →

Soul Proprietor | Summer Concert Series

Soul Proprietor | Urban, Soul, Motown, Funk, R&B and Classic Rock

Soul Proprietor is a high-energy 10-piece "Urban Soul" band playing the best of Funk, Blues, Motown, R&B and Classic Rock – great music that makes you want to get up and dance! Featuring outstanding vocalists Rob Vaughn and Patrice Thompson-Rose, this horn-laden funk machine plays it all - from Bruno Mars to Aretha Franklin and Stevie Wonder; Earth Wind & Fire to Chicago and Tower of Power! Time to Funkifize!

View Event →

Robert Vaughn | Summer Concert Series

Robert Vaughn | Jazz / Soul

Robert Vaughn has thrilled audiences all over the West Coast with his amazing vocal and guitar style, performing a soulful blend of Jazz, R&B and original music.

View Event →

Starcourt | Summer Concert Series

Starcourt | 80’s Party Rock

Spokane's premier 80's cover band.

View Event →

Jason Evans | Summer Concert Series

Jason Evans | Soul / R&B

Jason has an incredibly beautiful and soulful voice. Start your evening entertainment with jazzy, funky and smooth music!

View Event →

The Rising | Summer Concert Series

The Rising | Rock

The Rising is a highly energetic 3 piece cover band, performing your favorite current music to hits of the past. Many of you might remember them from Pig Out in the Park 2022!

View Event →

Green Corduroy | Summer Concert Series

Green Corduroy | Jazz / Rock / Reggae

Green Corduroy brings their unique blend of jazz, rock, and reggae sounds to Arbor Crest for another amazing night of Fun!

View Event →

Sara Brown Band | Summer Concert Series

Sara Brown Band | Rhythm / Blues

Sara Brown, a small-town redhead from Stevens County, packs each track with her signature power-house vocal style, but also displays subtle nuance and versatile stylizations as the unique mood of each song demands.

View Event →

Ron Greene | Summer Concert Series

Ron Greene | Groovy Blues

Ron Greene is a singer/songwriter who performs soulful alt-pop music specializing in lyrics about life, love and the world around us. His soulful rock blends with the emotionally charged pop performance.

View Event →

Nu Jack City | Summer Concert Series

Nu Jack City | Motown Party

Inland Northwest Motown band Nu Jack City began 20 years ago as the passion project of band leader Max Daniels and his sister Monee Hamm. Since then the band has grown to 10 members, including another sister, and has been wowing audiences with their high energy Motown sound!

View Event →

Pamela Benton | Summer Concert Series

Pamela Benton | Jazz / Contemporary

A resplendent violinist and performs proficiently on several instruments: Lead & Harmony Vocals, Electric Violin, Acoustic Violin Electric Guitar, Acoustic Guitar, Mandolin, Bass and Piano.

View Event →

Kaitlyn Wiens Band | Summer Concert Series

Kaitlyn Wiens Band | Jazz / Soul / Contemporary

Kaitlyn Wiens is a Spokane based original artist who specializes in bringing a unique jazz twist to well-known pop music. Her and her band's repertoire includes modern takes on jazz standards as well as high energy pop tunes that will make you want to get up and dance.

View Event →

Dueling Pianos | Summer Events

Dueling Pianos | Piano Fight

Welcome Dueling Pianos!

Get ready to request your favorite songs and compete with other guests to see whose song will be played next! Join us for an evening filled with entertainment, delicious food, and exceptional wine and beer, all while surrounded by great company.

Tables are available for seating up to 8 people. If you want to sit with your friends, there is discount for purchasing a whole table for yourselves. Table seats are $40 each or $280 for a full table of eight. If you prefer a more relaxed setting, lawn seating is also available for $25. Doors open at 5:00pm. Table Seating at 5:30pm. Performance starts at 6:00pm.

Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to have a blast with your friends and enjoy some friendly competition. See you there!

Food is available from the Arbor Crest Truck or Grill or you can bring your own picnic!

View Event →

Craig Catlett Quartet | Summer Concert Series

Craig Catlett Quartet | Jazz / Swing

The Craig Catlett Quartet combines years of experience in four talented musicians who bring you classic hits from the 60s-90s. Adding the woodwinds and vocal harmonies to all time favorites, they will have you dancing, or just singing along!

View Event →

Kevin Shay Band | Summer Concert Series

Kevin Shay Band | Rockin Oldies

Piano Rockin Oldies from the 50's 60s 70s and 80s.

View Event →

Echo Elysium | Summer Concert Series

Echo Elysium | Soul / Blues / Rock / Hip-Hop

A nuanced and dynamic electric and acoustic guitarist, has been “transporting audiences to alternate dimensions” for over 15+ years in the PNW

View Event →

The Spokane Symphony at Arbor Crest | Rhapsody in Blue

The Spokane Symphony | Rhopsody in Blue

Jingqi Zhu, conductor

Arbor Crest Cliff House Estate and Gershwin’s Rhapsody in Blue share a monumental birthday – both turn 100! Celebrate like it’s 1924 with an ensemble of Spokane Symphony musicians joined by pianist Priscila Navarro. Spokane’s jazz vocalist Heather Villa brings 20’s music to life with her sultry voice. Come early to enjoy food and beverages from Arbor Crest’s food truck, grill and bars. Hot food served from 5-7pm. Charcuterie and formaggio boards, hummus and desserts served until 8pm.

DOORS 5PM | SHOW 7:30PM | 20-minute intermission

View Event →

Soulful Brothers | Summer Concert Series Under the Vineyard Tent

Soulful Brothers | Traditional and New Age Soul

This event has been moved to the Vineyard Tent to keep you dry!

Soulful Brothers is a powerful 3-4 piece band performing across the Pacific Northwest. As they make their encore performance at the Cliff House Estate , we anticipate a concert full of Soul and Energy!

View Event →

Lyle Morse | Summer Concert Series

Lyle Morse | Roots / Americana

An outstanding acoustic guitarist, harmonica player, singer-songwriter-performer who currently calls Eastern Washington state his home. He has been refining his musical vision and talents over a number of decades His music is expressive, moving and profound, because he concentrates his energies on acoustic blues music, and other forms of American roots music.

View Event →

Spare Parts | Summer Concert Series

Spare Parts | Pop / Rock

With a song repertoire that pulls from five decades of popular music, Spare Parts leaves no musical stone unturned in the Pop/Rock/Folk and Country genres. If you enjoy musical variety, acoustic sounds and tight harmonies, these guys might just earn your undivided attention.

View Event →

KŌSH | Summer Concert Series

KŌSH | Classic Rock

KŌSH has been performing since 1983 across the nation. From private intimate settings to stadium arenas, the contemporary and classic sounds of KŌSH can rock any venue!

View Event →

One Street Over | Summer Concert Series

One Street Over | Pop / Rock / Jazz / Blues / Country

One of the top performing acts in the Pacific Northwest, they can play the room and set the right atmosphere or they can take over and rock the house.

View Event →

Christy Lee | Summer Concert Series

Christy Lee | Country

Christy Lee, a country music powerhouse out of Nashville, Tennessee is ready to kick off our Summer Concert Series with a rockin’ performance!

View Event →

van Loben Sels Vertical | Wine Education

Join us for an evening to taste our Familty Red Wines, and experience how it has changed over the years. We will discuss vintage variation, choices made by the winemaker, and cellaring practices for the collector in all of us. Wine and space is limited! Since we are diving into the cellar, we will have only (30) seats available for this event and a very limited amount of these wines available for purchase.

View Event →
